catalog:
Aberrant Mark of Contagion Heroic Dragonmark Ongoing Damage Physical Change Power Enhancement Saving Throw Penalty Whenever you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against ongoing damage until the end of the encounter. You are immune to the negative effects of diseases from sources that are more than 5 levels lower than you, though you still carry and spread those diseases. Aberrant Mark of Madness Heroic Dragonmark Defense Penalty Physical Change Power Enhancement Whenever you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to Will until the end of the encounter. You are immune to the negative effects of madness from sources 5 levels lower than yourself. Aberrant Mark of Terror Heroic Dragonmark Attack Penalty Fear Physical Change Power Enhancement Whenever you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, that enemy takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of the encounter. This is a Fear effect. You are immune to the negative effects of Fear and intimidation from sources 5 levels lower than yourself. Academy Prodigy Heroic race Eladrin class Artificer Class Racial Skill Enhancement You gain a +3 feat bonus to two skills from the artificer's class skill list. This counts as the Skill Focus feat for these skills. Accidental Tells Heroic Bloodline race Tiefling feat Mantle of Misfortune Luck Misfortune Bloodline Racial Skill Enhancement When you make an Insight check against a creature within the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you can roll twice and take the better result. Accurate Magic Armaments Heroic class Artificer Attack Bonus Class Equipment Support Whenever you use an Artificer power that targets a weapon or an implement, the next attack roll with that weapon or implement before the end of the encounter gains a +1 bonus. Accursed Challenge Heroic class Paladin deity Avandra Class Mark Punishment Saving Throw Penalty Worship Whenever a creature marked by you makes an attack that does no include you as a target, the target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the start of its next turn. Accursed Coordination Heroic class Warlock feature Warlock's Curse Class Combat Advantage Teamwork You can place your warlock's curse on a creature that is already affected by another character's curse. In addition, you have combat advantage against any creature affected by more than one warlock's curse. Acid Wash Heroic race Genasi power acid surge racial Acid Specialization Condition Negation Mobility Power Enhancement Racial When you use acid surge, you ignore the immobilized, restrained, and slowed conditions during the move. Acolyte of Divine Secrets Heroic Multiclass ability Wisdom 13 Multiclass Invoker Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training You gain training in the Religion skill. Choose a 1st-level Invoker at-will attack power. You can use that power as an encounter power. In addition, you gain proficiency in Invoker implements. Acolyte of the Veil Heroic Multiclass ability Dexterity 13 Multiclass Assassin Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training Stealth You gain training in the Acrobatics or Stealth skill. You can use shadow step as an encounter power. In addition, you gain proficiency in ki focuses. Action Rush Heroic race Human ; class Ranger or class Rogue Action Point Class Mobility Racial When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can shift 2 squares as a free action either before or after taking the extra action. Action Surge Heroic race Human Action Point Attack Bonus Racial You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls you make during any extra action you gain by spending an action point. Active Familiar Heroic Familiar feat Arcane Familiar Familiar Mobility When you take a move action, you can also move your familiar its speed or shift it 1 square. Adaptable Breath Heroic race Dragonborn power dragon breath racial Power Enhancement Racial Choose a type of damage your dragon breath doesn't already deal from among acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to use the chosen damage type and corresponding damage keyword rather than the normal damage dealt by the power. Only one damage type and keyword applies to a given attack. You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another damage type for your dragon breath that you don't already have for it. Adaptable Nature Heroic race Goliath Racial Skill Enhancement Whenever any creature you can see succeeds on a skill check, you gain a +2 feat bonus to that skill until the end of your next turn. Adept Dilettante Heroic Multiclass race Half-elf Multiclass Power Enhancement Racial You can use your Constitution, Wisdom, or Charisma to determine bonuses to attack rolls and damage with the power you chose for your Dilettante racial trait instead of the ability that power normally uses. This feat counts as a class-specific multiclass feat for the class from which your Dilettante power comes. Advantage of Cunning Heroic class Bard feature Virtue of Cunning Class Forced Movement When you slide an ally with your Virtue of Cunning feature, you can also slide an enemy that was adjacent to that ally into the space the ally vacated. Advantageous Eye Heroic Bloodline feat Vistani Heritage Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Support Vistani Heritage When you hit a target with your evil eye of the Vistani bloodline power, the target grants combat advantage to all your allies for the duration of the power. Advantageous Rebuke Heroic class Invoker feature Covenant of Preservation Attack Bonus Channel Divinity Class Combat Advantage Support When you hit with an attack that is benefitting from a bonus to the attack roll from preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, the target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. Aegis Accuracy Heroic class Swordmage feature Swordmage Aegis Attack Bonus Class Mark Punishment If a target marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the marked creature until the end of your next turn. Aegis Vitality Heroic class Swordmage feature Swordmage Aegis Class Mark Punishment Temporary Hit Points If a target marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, you gain 5 temporary hit points. These temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and 15 at 21st level. Aerenal Arcanist Heroic race Elf class any arcane background Aerenal Arcane Background Power Repertoire Racial Choose an additional power for each level of utility power you know from an arcane class. Each time you learn a new level of utility powers for an arcane class, choose an additional one of the same level. After an extended reach, choose which arcane utility power of each level you can use for that day. This feat does not change the number of arcane utility powers you can use each day. If you use a Spellbook, the additional utility power is in addition to any you gain from that feature. Aerenal Half-life Heroic race Elf background Aerenal Action Point Attack Bonus Background Necrotic Specialization Racial You gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with necrotic powers. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and +4 at 21st level. In addition, you also gain the bonus to attack rolls with necrotic powers you make during any extra action you gain by spending an action point. Against All Odds Heroic ability Wisdom 13 Attack Bonus Damage Bonus If, at the start of your turn, three or more enemies are adjacent to you, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of your turn. The bonus to damage rolls increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Aggressive Advantage Heroic Combat Advantage Initiative You gain combat advantage against all enemies until the end of your first turn in each combat. Aggressive Assault Heroic class Rogue feature First Strike feature Brutal Scoundrel Class Forced Movement Initiative At the beginning of an encounter, whenever you hit a target that has not yet acted, you slide that target 1 square. Aggressive Spirit Heroic class Shaman Class Kill Effect Teleportation Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a spirit attack power, you can teleport your spirit companion 10 squares to a square adjacent on an enemy as a free reaction. Agile Form Heroic class Druid power wild shape class Class Mobility Shapechange When you use your wild shape to change from your humanoid form to a beast form, you can shift 1 square. Starting at 21st level, you can shift 2 squares. Agile Guardian Heroic ability Dexterity 13 class Warden Class Mobility Power Enhancement Shapechange You can shift 1 square when you assume a Guardian Form. Starting at 21st level, you can shift 2 squares. Agile Hunter Heroic ability Dexterity 15 class Ranger feature Hunter's Quarry Attack Penalty Class Critical Mobility When you score a critical hit with a melee attack against your quarry, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. In addition, the enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn. Agile Running Attack Heroic class Ranger feature Running Attack Class Mobility When you move as part of using a Ranger attack power, you ignore difficult terrain. Agile Stand Heroic class Avenger or class Monk or class Ranger or class Rogue Class Mobility Once per turn when you stand up from prone, you can also shift 1 square. This increases to up to 2 squares at 21st level. Agile Superiority Heroic class Fighter feature Combat Superiority Attack Bonus Class Opportunity Attacks The attack bonus for your Combat Superiority uses your Dexterity modifier instead of your Wisdom modifier. Airspur Windrider Heroic background Akanûl Background Mobility You subtract 10 feet from the distance you fall before determining falling damage. This increases to 20 feet subtracted at 21st level. Alchemical Affinity Heroic race Warforged Equipment Racial Temporary Hit Points Once per attack when you hit an enemy using a consumable alchemical item attack power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level. Alchemical Blood Heroic race Warforged Damage Bonus Equipment Racial Temporary Hit Points Choose one damage type from the following: acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, or thunder. When you use an attack power or an alchemical item attack power with the chosen keyword, you gain a +2 feat bonus to the damage roll. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. Additionally, while you have any temporary hit points, you gain an untyped +1 bonus to damage rolls with alchemical item attack powers. Alchemical Opportunist Heroic Equipment Opportunity Attacks If you have an alchemical item in hand when an enemy provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use that alchemical item instead of making a melee basic attack. Alchemical Scrounger Heroic Equipment Miss Mitigation When you miss all targets with an alchemical item, roll a d20. On a result of 10 or higher, you can recover the item as a short rest activity. You can only recover one item per day. If you take this feat as a paragon tier feat, you can recover two alchemical items each day. If you take it as an epic tier feat, you can recover three. Alchemist Heroic Equipment You can make alchemical items of your level or lower. You must have the correct formula and training in an appropriate skill. You learn two formulas of your level or lower when you first take this feat. If you receive the Ritual Caster feat from a class feature, you can choose to gain this feat instead. If the feature grants you additional rituals known, you instead gain alchemical formulas at the same rate. Alertness Heroic Initiative Perception You cannot be surprised. Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Perception checks. Alhahn's Mindful Relocation Heroic race Githzerai trait Shifting Fortunes Mobility Racial When you use your Shifting Fortunes, you can shift your speed instead of 3 squares. Allegiance to the Daughter Heroic class Warlock feature Infernal Pact Class Fire Specialization Kill Effect Whenever you reduce an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points or less with a warlock attack, the enemy's space fills with hellfire until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the flames takes fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level. Ambush Tactics Heroic class any martial Class Damage Bonus Initiative The first enemy you damage during the first round of an encounter takes 1d6 extra damage if it has not acted yet. This damage increases to 2d6 at 11th, and 3d6 at 21st level. Ancestral Wrath Heroic Bloodline race Dwarf heritage Forgeborn Bloodied Charge Forgeborn Heritage Mobility Racial While you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to speed. This increases to a +2 bonus when you charge. Ancient Covenant of Nessus Heroic race Tiefling class Invoker feature Divine Covenant Class Extra Attack Fire Specialization Racial When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, instead of your normal covenant manifestation, you can allow one target of the power to make a basic attack as a free reaction. If the target makes this attack, it takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier after resolving the attack. This fire damage increases to 10 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 15 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level. Ancient Lore of the Dawn War Heroic Languages Skill Enhancement You have studied the lore of old deities and the history of the Dawn War: you gain a +2 feat bonus to History and Religion checks, and you gain the Supernal language. Ancient Soul Heroic race Dragonborn class Sorcerer feature Dragon Magic power dragon breath racial Class Power Enhancement Power Recovery Racial You can consider your dragon breath racial power an arcane attack power, adding the Arcane keyword to it. In addition, if your dragon breath deals damage of the same type as your Dragon Magic feature gives you resistance to, you gain the following benefit: Whenever you take damage of the type dealt by your dragon breath (after the damage dealt is reduced by your resistance), you regain the use of your dragon breath if you have already expended it. Ancient Wisdom Heroic race Wilden class Shaman power voyage of the ancients Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Racial Support When you use your voyage of the ancients power, the enemy you choose also grants combat advantage to each ally adjacent to your spirit companion until the end of your next turn. Angelic Harrier Heroic class Invoker Class Forced Movement Power Enhancement When you hit only one target with an Invoker ranged encounter or daily attack, you can slide the target 1 square after the power has been resolved. Anger Unleashed Heroic race Half-orc Attack Bonus Bloodied Racial The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. Animal Empathy Heroic skill Nature Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks. Also, when you would make an Insight check against a natural beast, you can make a Nature check instead. Ankle Biter Heroic race Goblin Critical Damage Bonus Racial Size-based You gain a +1 bonus to melee damage rolls against creatures larger than you. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and +3 at 21st level. Also, when you score a critical hit against a creature larger than you, the creature takes 1d6 extra damage. This extra damage increases to 2d6 at 21st level. Ankle Cutter Heroic size Small or smaller class Rogue feature Sneak Attack Class Movement Hindrance Racial Size-based When you hit a target that is at least two sizes larger than you (Large, if you are small) and would deal Sneak Attack damage against that target, you can forgo rolling two of your Sneak Attack dice. If you do so, you cause the target to be slowed until the end of your next turn. Using this option count as using Sneak Attack for the turn, even if you end up not rolling any Sneak Attack damage. Ape's Reach Heroic class Druid power wild shape class Basic Attack Bloodied Class Shapechange Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Athletics checks. Additionally, when you are in beast form and you are bloodied, you gain +1 reach with melee basic attacks. Arcane Dockhand Heroic Background Mobility Rituals Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 bonus to Acrobatics checks made to balance, and to Athletics checks made to climb. Also, you master the ritual make whole and can perform it without a ritual book. Arcane Familiar Heroic Familiar class any arcane Class Familiar You gain a familiar. For each Familiar feat you have beyond this one, your familiar gains a +1 bonus to all defenses. Arcane Fire Heroic ability Intelligence 13 class any arcane Class Cold Specialization Fire Specialization When you hit a target with an arcane fire power, that target gains vulnerable 5 cold against the first arcane attack power you use against it before the end of your next turn. This vulnerability increases to vulnerable 10 cold at 21st level. Arcane Fury Heroic race Half-orc class any arcane power furious assault racial Class Damage Bonus Racial When you use your furious assault racial power to deal extra damage to the target of an area or close arcane power, you deal the extra damage to all targets you hit with the power, not just one. Arcane Implement Proficiency Heroic class any arcane Class Proficiency Gain Choose a type of implement that any arcane class is proficient in. You gain proficiency in that kind of implement. If the implement is also a weapon, you do not gain proficiency in using it as a weapon. Arcane Initiate Heroic Multiclass ability Intelligence 13 Multiclass Wizard Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training You gain training in the Arcana skill. Choose a 1st-level wizard at-will attack power. You can use that power as an encounter power. In addition, you gain proficiency in Wizard implements. Arcane Malice Heroic Spellscar class any arcane Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Spellscar Whenever you make an arcane daily attack, choose one creature you hit with that attack. You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the chosen creature until the end of the encounter. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, you also gain +1 attack bonus against that creature until the end of the encounter. Arcane Porter Heroic Familiar feat Arcane Familiar Equipment Familiar Your familiar can pick up and carry an unattended object weighing 5 pounds or less. It can hold only one object at a time. Arcane Prodigy Heroic Multiclass ability Charisma 13 Damage Bonus Multiclass Sorcerer Skill Training You gain training in Arcana. Once per encounter as a free action, you gain a +2 bonus to your next damage roll. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and +4 at 21st level. In addition, you gain proficiency in Sorcerer implements. Arcane Repositioning Heroic race Eladrin class any arcane power fey step racial Class Racial Summoning Teleportation On your turn, you can use a free action to expend your fey step to teleport one of your conjurations or a creature you have summoned rather than yourself. If you do so, select one conjuration or summoned creature within 5 squares of you and teleport it 5 squares. You cannot teleport a conjuration larger than 1 square or a summoned creature that size Large or larger. Arcane Reserves Heroic race Human class any arcane Class Damage Bonus Racial If all your arcane encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your arcane at-will attack powers until the end of your encounter or until you regain the use of one or more of your arcane encounter attack powers. This bonus increases to +3 at 21st level. Arcane Spellfury Heroic class Sorcerer Attack Bonus Class When you hit an enemy with a sorcerer at-will attack power, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the end of your next turn. Arcane Trapsmith Heroic class Artificer skill Thievery Class Skill Enhancement Traps You can use your Intelligence modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier when making Thievery checks to disable traps or open locks. Also, you gain a +4 feat bonus to Arcana checks related to traps or hazards. Arcane Vampire Heroic class Vampire and class any arcane Class Combination Damage Bonus Healing Surge Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with an arcane encounter attack, you gain a healing surge. As a nonaction interrupt before rolling damage for an arcane encounter attack power, you can lose a healing surge to gain a bonus to the triggering power's damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier. This bonus damage increases to 3 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and 6 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level. Ardent Tsucora Initiation Heroic race Kalashtar class Ardent power ardent outrage class Class Movement Hindrance Power Enhancement Racial When you use ardent outrage, each target treats squares adjacent to you as difficult terrain until the end of its next turn. Arena-Fighter's Recovery Heroic class Fighter feature Arena Training Class Damage Bonus Second Wind Weapon Specialization When you use your second wind, you gain a bonus to damage rolls with your arena weapons until the end of your next turn. The bonus is equal to your Dexterity modifier. The damage bonus increases to 2 + your Dexterity modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Dexterity modifier at 21st level. Argent Falcon Heroic Familiar feat Arcane Familiar utility power 6th-level or higher deity Sehanine Combat Advantage Familiar Illumination Support Worship You replace one utility power of 6th level or higher with the argent falcon feat power. Argent Falcon Feat Utility 6 Your familiar briefly transforms into a silver falcon, and shines with pure moonlight Encounter Divine Minor Action true Effect: Until the end of your next turn, your familiar sheds bright light in its space and each square within 3 squares of it. Enemies within the light grant combat advantage. Armor Endurance Training Heroic Armor Skill Enhancement You ignore the check penalty to Strength- and Constitution-based skills for wearing armor with all armors you are proficient in. Armor Expertise Heroic class any martial Armor Class Skill Enhancement You ignore the check penalty to skills for wearing armor with all armors you are proficient in. Armor Nimbleness Training Heroic Armor Skill Enhancement You ignore the check penalty to Dexterity-based skills for wearing armor with all armors you are proficient in. Armor of Burning Wrath Heroic class Invoker feature Covenant of Wrath Channel Divinity Class Fire Specialization Power Enhancement Your armor of wrath Channel Divnity power deals fire and radiant damage and gains the Fire keyword. The target also takes a -1 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn. Armor of Winter Heroic class Invoker feature Covenant of Wrath deity the Raven Queen Channel Divinity Class Cold Specialization Condition Infliction Power Enhancement Undead-hunting Worship Your armor of wrath Channel Divnity power gains additional benefits against undead: ► An undead target takes an additional 1d6 cold damage, and the power gains the Cold keyword when targeting undead. This additional damage increases to 2d6 at 21st level. ► An undead bloodied by the attack is also immobilized until the end of its next turn. Armor Proficiency (Chainmail) Heroic ability Strength 13 ability Constitution 13 ; proficiency leather armor or proficiency hide armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with chainmail armor. Armor Proficiency (Hide) Heroic ability Strength 13 ability Constitution 13 proficiency leather armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with hide armor. Armor Proficiency (Leather) Heroic Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with leather armor. Armor Proficiency (Plate) Heroic ability Strength 15 ability Constitution 15 proficiency scale armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with plate armor. Armor Proficiency (Scale) Heroic ability Strength 13 ability Constitution 13 proficiency chainmail armor Armor Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency with scale armor. Armor Snag Heroic proficiency plate armor or proficiency shield Armor Grapple Shield You've learned to use your armor and shield to injure any opponent foolish enough to grab you. When wearing plate armor you are proficient with or wielding a shield you are proficient with, a creature takes damage equal to 2 + one-half your level when you escape that creature's grab or when that creature escapes your grab. A creature can take damage from this only once per turn. A creature that swallows you or uses a similar ability takes this damage at the end of its turn as long as you remain swallowed or similarly held. Armored Sorcerer Heroic class Sorcerer feature Spell Source proficiency leather armor Armor Class Damage Resistance When you are wearing leather armor you are proficient in, any resistance you have gained through your Spell Source feature increases by 2. This benefit increases to 3 at 11th level, and to 5 at 21st level. Armored Warlord Heroic class Warlord feature Battlefront Leader Armor Class Healing Surge Proficiency Gain You gain one Armor Proficiency feat of your choice without having to meet the ability score prerequisites. In addition, your number of healing surges increases by 1. Armored Warrenguard Heroic race Gnome Armor Defense Mobility Proficiency Gain Racial Size-based You gain proficiency in chainmail armor and scale armor. If you already had proficiency with one or both, you instead ignore the penalty to speed for wearing chainmail or scale armor you are proficient in. In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to AC against attacks from Large or larger enemies. Assassin's Challenge Heroic class Assassin class Paladin power assassin's shroud class Class Combination Power Enhancement Mark Punishment Proficiency Gain You gain proficiency in holy symbol implements. In addition, whenever a creature takes damage from your divine sanction, that creature takes 1 extra damage for each of your shrouds on it. This extra damage increases to 2 per shroud at 11th level, and to 3 per shroud at 21st level. Assassin's Cloak Heroic class Assassin Class Stealth Whenever you become invisible, you can make Stealth check to hide as a free reaction. Assassin's Escape Heroic class Assassin power shade form class Class Damage Resistance Triggered You can use your shade form power as an immediate interrupt triggered by you taking damage. Astral Elixir Heroic race Deva class Artificer power artificer infusion: shielding elixir class Class Damage Resistance Power Enhancement Racial Radiant Specialization Saving Throws When you use shielding elixir, the target gains radiant resistance in addition to the resistance the power normally grants. The radiant resistance is equal to the resistance normally granted and has the same duration. Also, when making a saving throw, the target can end the shielding elixir's effect as a free interrupt to add 1d6 to the saving throw result instead of gaining the normal benefit for ending the effect. Astral Enmity Heroic race Deva class Avenger power memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power oath of enmity Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial If you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to increase an attack roll against your oath of enmity target, you deal extra damage equal to the bonus gained from the racial power. This extra damage increases to twice the bonus to attack at 11th level, and to three times the bonus to attack at 21st level. Astral Fire Heroic ability Dexterity 13 ability Charisma 13 Damage Bonus Fire Specialization Radiant Specialization You gain a +1 bonus to damage with powers that have the Fire or Radiant keyword. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Astral Heritage Heroic Bloodline race Living humanoid Astral Heritage Defense Power Repertoire Skill Enhancement You gain the astral splendor utility power. Also, you gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks and Insight checks against angels, devas, devils, and rakshasas. Astral Splendor Feat Utility You take on an imperious aspect, and silvery light -that of your astral soul- shines from your eyes, mouth, and heart Daily Divine, Stance Minor Action Requirement: You must not be bloodied. Effect: bold You enter the Astral Splendor stance. While you remain in the stance, enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls made against you. Also, you shed bright light within 6 squares, and dim light within a further 3 squares. Special: bold This stance immediately ends if you become bloodied. Astral Preservation Heroic race Deva class Invoker feature Covenant of Preservation Bloodied Enemy Channel Divinity Class Defense Power Enhancement Racial Support When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, each ally within 2 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to all defenses against attacks made by bloodied creatures. This bonus lasts until the end of the encounter. Audacious Crow Heroic Team Skill Enhancement Teamwork You gain a +2 feat bonus to Thievery checks. This bonus increases by +1 for each member of your Team within 10 squares who is trained in Thievery or has this feat. The maximum total bonus from this feat is +5. Auspicious Lineage Heroic race Deva power memories of a thousand lifetimes racial Power Enhancement Racial When you use your memories of a thousand lifetimes racial power, you add 1d8 to the triggering roll instead of 1d6. Autohypnosis Heroic class any psionic skill Arcana Class Healing Surge Skill Enhancement Your number of healing surges increases by 1. While you are not bloodied, when you would make an Endurance check, you can make an Arcana check instead. Avandra's Boon Heroic class any divine deity Avandra Class Miss Mitigation Saving Throws Worship When you roll a natural 1 on an attack roll or saving throw, you gain a +2 bonus to your next roll of the same type you make before the end of your next turn. Avandra's Covenant Heroic class Invoker feature Divine Covenant deity Avandra Class Saving Throws Support When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, you can allow an ally within 10 squares of you to make a saving throw instead of using your covenant manifestation. Avenger's Fortunes Heroic race Githzerai class Avenger Class Healing Surge Mobility Racial Whenever you spend a healing surge, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. If you have an oath of enmity target, this shift must take you closer to or into a square adjacent to that target. Avenging Allure Heroic class Avenger feature Censure of Unity Class Forced Movement Power Enhancement When you use your bond of censure power, add 2 to the number of squares you can pull the target. Avenging Opportunist Heroic race Human class Avenger power oath of enmity class Class Kill Effect Racial The first time in an encounter when you reduce your oath target to 0 hit points or less, you gain an extra move action that you must be used before the end of your next turn. Avenging Resolution Heroic class Avenger power oath of enmity class Class Damage Bonus When you attack your oath target with a Weapon attack, treat all rolls of 1 or 2 on the damage dice as though the result were a 3 on the die. If your weapon's damage is 1d4 or 2d4, treat rolls of 1 as though the result were a 2 on the die instead. Avernian Emissary Wrath Heroic race Tiefling class Assassin power assassin's shroud class power infernal wrath racial Class Miss Mitigation Racial Once per encounter, when you miss a target that has your shrouds on it, you can use your infernal wrath racial power against it. This does not expend infernal wrath and can be done even if it is expended. Avowed Dragonfoe Heroic race Dragonborn Attack Bonus Bloodied Critical Dragon-hunting Racial Temporary Hit Points You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against dragons. This bonus increases to +2 when you are bloodied. In addition, when you score a critical hit against a dragon with a melee or close attack, you gain temporary hit points equal to the dragon's level. Awakened Potential Heroic Multiclass ability Intelligence 15 skill Arcana Multiclass Ardent Multiclass Battlemind Multiclass Psion Psionics You gain the Psionic Augmentation class feature and 1 power point. You can spend this power point to augment powers, feats, or magic items that are Augmentable. Once you spend this power point, you do not regain it until you take an extended rest. You also qualify for feats that require the Psionic Augmentation class feature. You gain an additional power point at 21st level. When you take this feat, choose Ardent, Battlemind, or Psion. This feat counts as a multiclass feat for that class. Axe Expertise Heroic Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization When you make a Weapon attack with an axe, you can reroll one [W] of damage, or 2[W] for a daily attack. You must use the second result. The number of [W] you can reroll increases to 3[W] for a daily attack at 11th level, and to 2[W] for all attacks and 5[W] for a daily attacks at 21st level. Axe Strike Heroic power power strike attack Damage Bonus Miss Mitigation Power Enhancement When you miss a target with a Weapon attack using an Axe you have proficiency with and would deal no damage to it, you can expend your power strike class power. If you do, instead of the power's normal effects, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. For each +[W] past the first the power would normally deal, this damage increases by +2. Backbreaking Staff Heroic power backstab class Class Power Enhancement When you use backstab on an attack using a staff, on a hit the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn. Backstabber Heroic class Rogue feature Sneak Attack Class Damage Bonus The extra damage dice from your Sneak Attack class feature increase from d6 to d8. Baleful Malediction Heroic class Invoker feature Covenant of Malediction Attack Penalty Class Power Enhancement Whenever you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, each target hit by the power takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn. Balican High Praetor Heroic Pact class Warlock feature Sorcerer-King Pact feature Warlock's Curse feat Balican Praetor Background Class Damage Bonus Defense Power Enhancement Triggered Support Whenever an enemy under your warlock's curse drops to 0 hit points, you gain the following benefit in addition to regaining your fell might: ► The next ally you can see that hits with a damaging attack before the start of your next turn subjects its target to your curse. This extra damage increases to 5 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 7 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level. You can enhance powers associated with this feat with your fell might. If you have the majestic word class power, you can teleport the target 1 square instead of sliding it. Battering Shield Heroic proficiency heavy shield Forced Movement Shield When you are wielding a heavy shield and push or slide a target with a melee attack, you can move that target 1 additional square. Battle Awareness Heroic Multiclass ability Strength 13 ability Wisdom 13 Extra Attack Multiclass Fighter Skill Training Triggered You gain training in one skill from the Fighter's class skill list. Once per encounter, when an enemy that is adjacent to you shifts or makes an attack that does not include you as a target, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an immediate interrupt. Battle Berserker Heroic Multiclass ability Strength 13 Damage Bonus Multiclass Barbarian Skill Training You gain training in one skill from the Barbarian's class skill list. This increases to 3 + Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + Strength modifier at 21st level. Battle Intuition Heroic race Deva Initiative Racial You can use your Wisdom modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier to determine your Initiative bonus. In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Initiative checks. Battle Trample Heroic Mounted Combat Power Repertoire You gain the battle trample power. Battlemind Duulora Initiation Heroic race Kalashtar class Battlemind feature Speed of Thought Class Marking Racial When you use Speed of Thought, each enemy that is adjacent to you at the end of the move is marked until the end of its next turn. Beast Protector Heroic class Ranger feature Beast Mastery Animal Companion Class Teamwork Triggered If an enemy makes a melee attack against your beast companion, doing so provokes an opportunity attack from you. If you are adjacent to your beast companion, you can make the attack even if the triggering enemy is not within your reach (you attack the enemy's reaching limb, for instance). Beast Rider Heroic class Ranger feature Beast Mastery Animal Companion Class Mounted Combat If your beast companion is your size or larger, and at least Medium size, you can ride it as a mount. This is an exception to the rule that mounts must be no smaller than Large. You can mount or dismount your beast companion as a move action. Beast Training Heroic class Ranger feature Beast Mastery Animal Companion Class Skill Training Your beast companion gains training in a skill of your choice. If you change beast companions, you can also change the skill that this feat grants to your beast companion. You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, your beast companion gains training in another skill. Becomer Heroic race Changeling power changeling disguise racial Disguise Languages Racial Shapechange Skill Enhancement When you select this feat, you must choose one race that you can imitate with your changeling disguise racial power. You learn one language known by the race you chose. If the race can choose any language, so can you. Also, you gain a +2 racial bonus to one skill to which the chosen race gains a bonus to. If the race does not gain a bonus to any skill but gains training in a skill, you gain the bonus to that skill. If the chosen race can choose a skill to be trained in, you can choose a skill to gain the bonus to from the same choices. Additionally, when using your changeling disguise racial power to imitate your chosen race, you gain an additional +5 bonus to avoid detection. Bludgeon Expertise Heroic Damage Bonus Forced Movement Weapon Specialization When wielding a hammer or mace, you gain a +1 feat bonus to the number of squares you can push or slide creatures with Weapon attacks. This increases to +2 at 21st level. In addition, if you cannot push or slide a target the full distance because of blocking terrain, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. This damage increases to 4 + your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus at 11th level, and to 8 + your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus at 21st level. Blurred Longstep Heroic class Battlemind power blurred step class Class Mobility Power Enhancement When you use your blurred step class power, you shift 2 squares instead of 1 square. Blurring Claws Heroic race Shifter power razorclaw shifting racial Combat Advantage Damage Bonus Racial While you are under the effects of your razorclaw shifting, you gain a +1 bonus to melee Weapon damage rolls against any target granting combat advantage to you. This bonus to damage rolls increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Bogtangle Heritage Heroic Bloodline race Human Background Poison Power Repertoire Racial Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks. In addition, you gain the bog hunter's poison power. Bog Hunter's Poison Feat Utility You carefully apply to a weapon a poison that you extracted from local flora and fauna during a rest Daily Poison Minor Action Target: bold Melee touch one weapon true Effect: bold The next attack with the weapon that hits before the end of the encounter deals an extra ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). true 1 Each failed saving throw: italic The ongoing damage increases by 5, to a maximum of 15. true 1 Level 11: italic The initial ongoing damage increases to 10, and the maximum to 25. true 1 Level 21: italic The initial ongoing damage increases to 15, and the maximum to 35. Also, you can swap one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers for the bogtangle dart attack power. Bola Training Heroic Multiclass ability Dexterity 13 Mobility Hindrance Multiclass Bola Proficiency Gain Weapon Specialization You gain proficiency with the bola. When you make a Weapon attack with your bola and hit, you can forgo dealing damage to the target to immobilize it until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, the target is also knocked prone. In addition, you can learn the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level: Binding Bola Bola Attack 3 The weights entwine the cords around your target, wrapping it so tightly that it cannot maintain its momentum Encounter Martial, Weapon Standard Action Requirement: bold You must be wielding a bola Attack: bold Ranged weapon one creature Dexterity vs. Reflex true Hit: bold 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. true 1 Critical: bold The target is also knocked prone. true 1 Level 17: italic If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the damage increases to 4[W] + Dexterity. Bola Recovery Bola Utility 6 With the bola back in hand, you ready it for another precise throw Encounter Martial Minor Action Prerequisite: bold You must know the binding bola power Requirement: bold You must be wielding a bola true Effect: bold You regain the use of your binding bola power. Felling Bola Bola Attack 9 Such is the force of your throw, that your foe is knocked down it finds too painful stand back up again Daily Martial, Weapon Standard Action Requirement: bold You must be wielding a bola Attack: bold Ranged weapon one creature Dexterity vs. Reflex true Hit: bold 2[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage and the target is knocked prone. true The target cannot stand up from prone (save ends). true 1 Level 25: italic If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the damage increases to 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier. Miss: bold Half damage, and the target is knocked prone. The target cannot stand from prone until the end of its next turn. Bold Gamble Heroic class Warlord Class Combat Advantage Luck Support Whenever you spend an action point to gain an extra action and use it to make an attack, you can choose to take a gamble. If you do, you gain a benefit based on whether the attack hits or not. If the attack hits, the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn. If the attack misses, you grant combat advantage to the target until the end of your next turn. If your attack targets more than one creature, apply the gamble separately to each one. Boldness Through Luck Heroic race Halfling class Warlord Attack Bonus Class Luck Racial Support If an enemy has combat advantage against you and misses with a melee attack, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the start of its next turn. Bolstering Admixture Heroic race Warforged class Artificer power curative admixture class Class Racial Saving Throws Support When you use your curative admixture class power, the target can make a saving throw to end one ongoing effect that a save can end. Bolstering Breath Heroic role Leader race Dragonborn power dragon breath racial Attack Bonus Power Enhancement Racial Support Your dragon breath's attack targets only enemies instead of all creatures in the area. In addition, allies in the area of your dragon breath gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. Bolstering Inspiration Heroic race Dwarf class Warlord power warlord's aura class Class Healing Racial Saving Throws Support Triggered If an ally is adjacent to you when they use the Draw Inspiration action of your warlord's aura power, you can take a free interrupt to either increase the healing by your Wisdom modifier or to allow the ally to make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. The increased healing becomes 4 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and 8 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level. Bolstering Mantle Heroic class Ardent feature Ardent Mantle Class Healing Surge Saving Throws Support Temporary Hit Points Triggered Whenever you spend a healing surge, choose one ally within the radius of your Ardent Mantle. The chosen ally can either gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. The temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level. Bolstering Recovery Heroic ability Constitution 13 Healing Surge Temporary Hit Points Triggered When you spend one or more healing surges, you gain 5 temporary hit points in addition to any other benefits of spending that healing surge. If spending the healing surge grants you temporary hit points, instead increase the number gained by this amount. These temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level. Bolstering Spike Heroic class Battlemind power mind spike class Class Mark Punishment Power Enhancement Temporary Hit Points When you use your mind spike class power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. The temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level. Bolstering Step Heroic race Eladrin class any divine power fey step racial Class Mobility Power Enhancement Racial Temporary Hit Points Support When you use your fey step racial power, choose one ally adjacent to either your original space or your destination space. The chosen ally gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier, and can then shift 1 square as a free reaction. These temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level, and the shift inreases to 2 squares at 21st level. Bolstering Touch Heroic race Half-elf class Paladin power lay on hands class Class Healing Power Enhancement Support When you use your lay on hands on an ally, the target can use your healing surge value instead of his or her own healing surge value to determine amount of healing. Bonded Familiar Heroic Familiar class any arcane feat Arcane Familiar Class Familiar Telepathy You and your familiar can communicate telepathically out to a range of 10 squares. You must have line of sight and line of effect to your familiar to communicate with it in this manner. At 11th level, you can communicate out to a range of 50 squares. You can communicate out to a range of 10 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect. At 21st level, you can communicate out to a range of 1 mile. You can communicate out to a range of 50 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect, and to a range of 10 squares even if you have neither. Boon of the Made Heroic Bloodline feat Elan Heritage Elan Heritage Damage Resistance Power Enhancement When you use your elan resilience power, you also gain resistance to all damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the start of the triggering enemy's next turn. This resistance increases to 3 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level. Born in Darkness Heroic race Mul Background Perception Racial Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Dungeoneering and Perception checks. In addition, you gain low-light vision. Born of Shadows Heroic Background Saving Throws Shadow Nature Skill Enhancement Stealth Your origin changes to shadow, making you considered an shadow creature for all purposes instead of your previous creature origin, such as natural or fey. Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Stealth In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while in dim light or darkness. Born of the Elements Heroic origin elemental or skill Arcana Elemental Nature Languages Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Endurance and Intimidate checks. In addition, you can speak, read and write primordial. Bountiful Fortune Heroic class Cleric power divine fortune Channel Divinity deity Avandra Channel Divinity Class Support Temporary Hit Points Worship When you use your divine fortune Channel Divinity power, you and each ally adjacent to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. The temporary hit points increase to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level. Bow Caster Heroic race Elf class any arcane Class Implement Specialization Proficiency Gain Racial Weapon Specialization You gain proficiency in bows as an implement. Bow Expertise Heroic Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization You gain a +1 bonus to Weapon damage rolls with a bow when you attack a single target that is not adjacent to any creatures. The damage bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Bracing Breath Heroic ability Constitution 13 race Dragonborn class Fighter power dragon breath racial Attack Bonus Class Power Enhancement Racial Temporary Hit Points When you use your dragon breath racial power, you gain the following benefits until the end of your next turn: ► You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with melee powers that grant temporary hit points to you. ► You count as having spent an additional healing surge for powers with varying benefits based on how many you have spent. Bravo's Finish Bravo Attack 9 If your vicious assault doesn't bring your prey down, it is rattled to its core Daily Fear Nonaction Interrupt Trigger: bold You hit your prey with an at-will attack true Effect: bold The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage, or +1d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack, and your prey is dazed (save ends). true 1 Aftereffect: italic The target grants combat advantage (save ends). true 1 Level 25: italic If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the triggering attack deals +4[W] damage, or +4d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack. Bravura Leader Heroic class Warlord Action Point Class Damage Bonus Support When an ally who can see and hear you spends an action point to make an attack, that ally can choose to make the attack with bravado. If the ally does, he or she deals +4 additional damage with the attack, but grants combat advantage to any target of the attack until the end of his or her next turn. The additional damage increases to +6 at 11th level, and to +8 at 21st level. Bravura Shroud Heroic race Shadar-kai class Warlord feat Bravura Leader Action Point Class Concealment Defense Racial Support Whenever an ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Leader feat, that ally gains concealment until the end of his or her next turn. Bravura Spirit Heroic race Dragonborn class Warlord feat Bravura Leader Action Point Attack Bonus Bloodied Class Racial Support Whenever a bloodied ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Leader feat, that ally gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls for the attack. Breath of Life Heroic race Dragonborn class Cleric power dragon breath racial Class Power Enhancement Racial Support Temporary Hit Points Your dragon breath racial power targets only enemies for the attack. In addition, allies within the area gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier or your Constitution modifier. These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Strength modifier or your Consitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Strength modifier or your Constitution modifier at 21st level. Breath of the Gods Heroic race Dragonborn class Invoker feature Divine Covenant power dragon breath racial Class Power Enhancement Racial Skill Enhancement Your dragon breath racial power counts as a divine encounter attack power for the purposes of your Covenant Manifestation feature. In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Diplomacy checks. Breath-Resistant Beast Heroic race Dragonborn class Ranger feature Beast Mastery power dragon breath racial Animal Companion Class Damage Resistance Racial Your beast companion gains resist 5 + one-half your level to the damage type of your dragon breath racial power. If you can choose between different damage types when using your dragon breath racial power, choose one of those damage types for your beast companion to resist at the end of an extended rest. If your dragon breath racial power can deal more than one type of damage at once, your beast companion can resist a similar combination. Bred for Battle Heroic race Mul Attack Bonus Background Initiative Mobility Racial You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative checks. During the first round of an encounter, you also gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and speed. Brilliant Darkfire Heroic race Drow class any divine power darkfire racial Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial Radiant Specialization When you hit a target with your darkfire racial power, the target gains vulnerability to radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn. This vulnerability increases to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level. Brimming Wrath Heroic race Half-orc class Battlemind power furious assault racial Class Mark Punishment Power Enhancement Psionics Racial When you use your furious assault racial power and have at least 1 power point, each enemy marked by you takes psychic damage equal to your Strength modifier. This psychic damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Strength modifier at 21st level. Brutal Curse Heroic class Warlock feature Warlock's Curse Class Damage Bonus When you roll your additional curse damage, reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher. Brutal Reach Heroic class Barbarian Class Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization When you are raging and wielding a two-handed reach weapon, you can reroll any weapon damage die that displays a 1 when making melee attacks. Brutal Wound Heroic class Rogue feature Sneak Attack feature Brutal Scoundrel Class Damage Bonus Ongoing Damage When your attack deals ongoing damage and you deal Sneak Attack damage to the target, add 1 to the ongoing damage for every die of Sneak Attack damage dealt. Brute Force Heroic race Goliath Condition Infliction Forced Movement Power Enhancement Racial When you hit an enemy with a melee Weapon daily attack, you can also push the target 1 square and knock the target prone. Buffeting Winds Heroic race Genasi class Warden power windwalker racial Class Forced Movement Mark Punishment Power Enhancement Racial When you use your windwalker racial power, you can slide each enemy marked by you a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. Building Camaraderie Heroic skill Diplomacy Skill Enhancement When you succeed on a Diplomacy check, you gain a +1 bonus to Diplomacy checks until the end of the encounter. This bonus is cumulative with itself. When you fail a Diplomacy check or a Bluff check, attempt an Intimidate check, or perform any hostile action, you lose any bonus from this feat and cannot gain the bonus again during this encounter. Burden of Guardianship Heroic race Wilden trait Nature's Aspect Racial Temporary Hit Points Triggered When you use a Nature's Aspect power and an ally is within 2 squares of you, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier. The temporary hit points increase to 5 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier at 21st level. Burden of Rejuvenation Heroic race Wilden trait Nature's Aspect Healing Healing Surge Racial Support Triggered When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value. Starting at 11th level, you can choose instead to spend a healing surge to allow an ally within 5 squares of you to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge. Burn Everything Heroic class any arcane Class Fire Specialization Your arcane Fire powers ignore an amount of fire resistance. The amount equals one-half the ability modifier of the ability you use to make the attack. The amount you ignore increases by 5 at 11th level, and by 10 at 21st level. In addition, you treat a creature that is immune to fire as instead having resist fire equal to 15 + one-half its level. Burning Blizzard Heroic ability Intelligence 13 ability Wisdom 13 Acid Specialization Cold Specialization Damage Bonus You gain a +1 bonus to damage with powers that have the Acid or Cold keyword. The additional damage increases to 2 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level. Enlightened Stone Heroic race Goliath class any psionic power stone's endurance racial Class Defense Power Enhancement Psionics Skill Enhancement When you make an Athletics check, you can use your Constitution modifier instead of your Strength modifier. Enlightened Transformation Heroic race Shifter class any psionic power razorclaw shifting racial Class Defense Power Enhancement Racial Shapechange Skill Enhancement While under the effects of your razorclaw shifting racial power, you also gain a +1 bonus to Will and a +3 bonus to Insight checks. Enmity's Eye Heroic Bloodline class Avenger power oath of enmity class feat Vistani Heritage Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Radiant Specialization Vistani Heritage When you use your evil eye of the vistani bloodline power against the target under your oath, you do not provoke opportunity attacks from that target. This radiant damage increases to 2d6 at 21st level. Enraged Boar Form Heroic class Druid power wild shape class Charge Class Damage Bonus Shapechange While you are in beast form, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with charge attacks. Escalating Assault Heroic class Swordmage power aegis of assault class Attack Bonus Class Mark Punishment You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll granted by your aegis of assault class power. The second time you use your aegis of assault against the same creature, this increases to a +2 bonus, and to a +3 bonus the third time you use it. The bonus resets to +1 if you are rendered unconscious, or if the same creature is no longer marked by your arcane aegis class power. Escape Artist Heroic skill Acrobatics Grapple Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks. Also, when you use the escape action, you can do so as a minor action. Eternal Void Memories Heroic race Deva class Assassin power memory of a thousand lifetimes racial Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to improve an attack roll, after the attack has been resolved, the target of that attack roll takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier. Evade and Strike Heroic race Halfling power second chance racial ; class Assassin with feature Assassin's Shroud or class Avenger with power oath of enmity class or class Ranger with feature Hunter's Quarry Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial You gain a benefit against a creature depending on your class: a creature under at least two of your shrouds if you're an Assassin, your oath target if you're an Avenger, or your quarry if you're a Ranger. The bonus to damage increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level. Exchange Power Heroic class Psion feature Psionic Augmentation power send thoughts class Class Power Recovery Psionics Support When you use your send thoughts class power to deliver a message to an ally who has the Psionic Augmentation class feature, you can choose to lose 1 power point to allow that ally to regain 1 power point. If you have the Empowered Dragon Breath, you gain a +6 bonus to the damage roll instead of +4. This increases to +10 instead of +6 at 21st level. If you have the Enlarged Dragon Breath feat, you can also choose to make your dragon breath racial power a close blast 2 to gain this benefit. Focused Mind Heroic Saving Throws You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against effects that daze, stun or knock you unconscious. Focused Superiority Heroic class Fighter feature Combat Superiority Class Damage Bonus Opportunity Attacks While you are wielding a one-handed weapon, you gain a bonus to damage rolls with opportunity attacks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier. Focused Talent Heroic Multiclass feat any multiclass psion Multiclass Psion Power Repertoire Choose one focus available as part of the Discipline Focus Psion class feature. You can use each power granted by that Discipline Focus as a daily power. Focusing Spellfury Heroic class Sorcerer Class Damage Bonus Triggered When you use a sorcerer at-will attack power and hit two or more creatures, you gain a +2 bonus to damage damage rolls with ranged and melee attack powers until the end of your next turn. This damage bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. Font of Chaos Heroic class Warden feature Font of Life Class Forced Movement Triggered When you succeed on a saving throw granted by your Font of Life class feature, you must slide one random creature adjacent to you 1 square. This slide increases to 2 squares at 21st level. Forgeborn Heritage Heroic Bloodline race Dwarf Acid Specialization Cold Specialization Damage Bonus Damage Resistance Fire Specialization Forgeborn Heritage Lightning Specialization Power Repertoire Racial Thunder Specialization Triggered You gain resist 2 acid, resist 2 cold, resist 2 fire, resist 2 lightning, and resist 2 thunder. These resists increase to 4 at 11th level, and to 8 at 21st level. Also, you gain the elemental legacy bloodline power. Elemental Legacy Forgeborn Attack You allow the elemental energy in your soul to swell forth and scour your foes Encounter Elemental; Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder Nonaction Interrupt Trigger: bold You hit an enemy with an attack true Effect: bold The triggering enemy takes 3 extra acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder damage. true 1 Level 11: italic 6 extra damage. true 1 Level 21: italic 9 extra damage. Formation Fighting Heroic class any martial Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Opportunity Attacks Teamwork Whenever you make an opportunity attack, you gain a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to the number of your allies adjacent to that enemy. The bonus to the damage roll increases to twice the number of your allies at 21st level. Fortifying Word Heroic class Cleric power healing word class Class Defense Power Enhancement Saving Throws The target of your healing word class power also gains a +2 bonus to Fortitude, and a +5 bonus to saving throws against Poison. These bonuses last until the end of your next turn. Fortunate Resistance Heroic class Sorcerer feature Wild Magic Class Damage Resistance Luck When you roll for your Wild Soul resistance, choose either 1-5 or 6-10. If the result of your first die roll is within the range you selected, you can choose any result to replate that roll. Fortune's Predator Heroic race Githzerai class Druid feature Primal Predator power wild shape Class Mobility Racial Shapechange When you use your wild shape class power to change from your beast form to your humanoid form, you can shift 2 squares instead of 1. If you have the Agile Form feat or the Pouncing Form feat, you increase the shift granted by that feat by 1 square. Foulborn Heritage Heroic Bloodline origin natural type humanoid Foulborn Heritage Physical Change Power Repertoire Psychic Specialization You are a foulborn. Your origin changes to aberrant instead of natural. Also, you have the unbalanced mind power. Unbalanced Mind Foulborn Utility Your connection to the Far Realm unleashes psychic pain in response to attack Encounter Aura, Psionic, Psychic Immediate Reaction Trigger: bold You take damage true Effect: bold Until the end of your next turn, you have an Aura 1 (Psionic, Psychic). true Any creature that enters the aura or ends its turn there takes 5 psychic damage. Four Winds Heroic Team Skill Enhancement Teamwork You gain a +2 feat bonus to Athletics checks. This bonus increases by +1 for each member of your Team within 10 squares who is trained in Athletics or has this feat. The maximum total bonus from this feat is +5. Four-Armed Flurry Heroic race Thri-kreen class Monk feature Flurry of Blows Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial When you use the power granted by your Flurry of Blows class feature, your attack deals 2 extra damage to one of the power's targets. The extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level. Starting at 21st level, you can apply the extra damage to two of the power's targets. Frantic Recovery Heroic race Human Action Point Racial Second Wind When you spend an action point, until the end of your next turn, you can use your second wind as a minor action. Free-Ranging Familiar Heroic Familiar class Artificer feat Arcane Familiar Class Familiar Mobility While in active mode, your familiar can exist up to 20 squares farther from than normal. You can take this feat a second time as a paragon feat to increase the distance by a further 25 squares, and a third time as an epic feat to increase the distance by a further 35 squares. Freeing Current Heroic race Genasi power swiftcurrent racial Condition Negation Mobility Power Enhancement Racial When you use your swiftcurrent racial power, you ignore the immobilized, restrained, and slowed conditions during the move. Starting at 11th level, you can also make a saving throw against one such effect that a save can end after using your swiftcurrent racial power. Starting at 21st level, you can make a save against each such effect that a save can end, or against one such effect even if it cannot be ended by a save normally. Friendly Deception Heroic class Bard power words of friendship class Class Power Enhancement Skill Enhancement When you use your words of friendship class power, you can choose to apply the power bonus to a Bluff check instead of a Diplomacy check. Frost Step Heroic class Warlock feature Fey Pact with the Winter Fey, power misty step class Class Movement Hindrance Power Enhancement Teleportation When you use your misty step class power, the space you teleport from and all squares adjacent to that space become difficult terrain to everyone but you or creatures with Icewalk. This difficult terrain lasts until the start of your next turn. Frozen Soul Heroic ability Constitution 13 or ability Wisdom 13 ; origin shadow or class any shadow Background Damage Resistance Defense Shadow Nature You gain resist 5 cold, and a +1 bonus to Will. Avenger: When you charge your oath target.
Barbarian: When you charge and are bloodied.
Ranger: When you charge your quarry. When you miss on a charge attack, you can use this feat to expend your furious assault racial power to reroll the attack roll. If the attack hits, you deal +1[W] extra damage to your quarry. This extra damage increases to +2[W] at 21st level. Furtive Signals Heroic Team Combat Advantage Languages Skill Enhancement Stealth Support Teamwork You gain a +2 feat bonus to Bluff checks. If the ally either also has this feat or is trained in Bluff, he or she can be within 5 squares instead. Gambler's Initiative Heroic class Sorcerer feature Wild Magic Class Initiative Luck Before rolling an Initiative check, choose even numbers or odd numbers. Get in Your Head Heroic race Gnome class any psionic power fade away racial Class Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Teleportation Your fade away racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation: Augment 1: The power gains the Teleportation keyword, and you can teleport 3 squares after becoming invisible. This extra damage increases to 3 at 11th level, and to 4 at 21st level. Group Assault Heroic race Half-elf class Fighter Class Damage Bonus Mark Punishment Racial Support Your allies gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against targets marked by you. This bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Group Defense Heroic race Half-elf class Paladin Class Defense Mark Punishment Racial Support Your allies gain a +1 bonus to all defenses against creatures marked by you. Group Insight Heroic race Half-elf Initiative Racial Skill Enhancement Support You grant allies within 10 squares of you a +1 racial bonus to Insight checks and Initiative checks. Group Mindlink Heroic race Kalashtar or race Shardmind ; trait Telepathy Racial Telepathy You can facilitate conversation between all your allies. Any ally within the range of your telepathy can communicate with you and any other ally or allies within the range of your telepathy. Group Quarry Heroic race Half-elf class Ranger feature Hunter's Quarry Class Damage Bonus Racial Support Your allies gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against your quarry. This bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Group Stealth Heroic race Gnome power fade away racial Racial Skill Enhancement Stealth Support Your allies within 10 squares of you gain a +2 racial bonus to Stealth checks. Group in Motion Heroic race Half-elf class Battlemind power speed of thought class Class Mobility Racial Support Triggered When you use your speed of thought class power, each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. Grudge Style Heroic class any martial ; ability Wisdom 15 or race Dwarf Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Opportunity Attacks Triggered When an enemy damages you, you gain the following benefits until the end of your next turn: ► Your melee martial at-will attacks deal additional damage against that enemy equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus). ► Your triggered attacks against that enemy, including opportunity attacks, deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum +2). Guaranteed Retribution Heroic class Avenger feature Censure of Retribution feature Oath of Enmity Attack Bonus Class Triggered When an enemy other than your oath target hits you, you gain a cumulative +1 bonus to attack rolls against your oath target until the end of your next turn. Guard of Stone Heroic race Goliath class Warden feature Nature's Wrath power stone's endurance racial Attack Penalty Class Mark Punishment Power Enhancement Racial While you are under the effects of your stone's endurance racial power, creatures marked by you suffer an additional penalty to attack rolls on attacks that do not target you. The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -2 penalty). Guarded Practice Heroic class any martial or class Monk Class Defense Power Enhancement Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Insight checks. Also, whenever you hit an enemy with a martial at-will attack or a monk at-will attack, until the start of your next turn, you do not count as flanked by the target you hit. Other creatures can still flank you, including with the target you hit. Guardian of the Towering Oak Heroic race Hamadryad power hamadryad aspects racial Power Enhancement Racial Skill Enhancement When you make a Diplomacy check or an Intimidate check, you can expend your hamadryad aspects racial power as a free interrupt. If you do, you roll the check twice and use either result. Guardian's Mishaps Heroic Bloodline race Tiefling role Defender feat Mantle of Misfortune Class Marking Misfortune Bloodline Racial When you slide a creature in the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you can mark that creature until the end of its next turn. Guide the Shot Heroic class Warlord Attack Bonus Class Support Whenever you grant an ally a ranged basic attack, that ally's attack ignores cover and concealment (but not superior cover or total concealment). Guiding Charge Heroic class Warlord ; feature Resourceful Presence or feature Skirmishing Presence Attack Bonus Charge Class Support When you charge, you can choose to forgo the bonus to your attack roll. If you do, choose one ally who can see you The chosen ally gains a +2 bonus to his or her first attack roll against the target of your charge. The bonus is lost if the ally does not attack the target before the end of your next turn. Guiding Step Heroic race Elf class Warlord Class Mobility Racial Support Whenever you use a power that lets your allies shift, they ignore the first square of difficult terrain during the shift. The number of difficult terrain ignored increases to 2 squares at 11th level, and to 3 squares at 21st level. Guileful Shift Heroic race Halfling class Avenger feature Oath of Enmity deity Avandra Class Mobility Racial Triggered Worship When your oath target misses you with an attack, you can use a free reaction to shift 1 square to a space closer to or adjacent to the target. This increases to 2 squares at 21st level. Hafted Defense Heroic Defense Weapon Specialization While you are wielding a polearm or staff in two hands, you gain a +1 shield bonus to AC and Reflex. You must have proficiency with the weapon to gain this bonus. Half-Elf Soul Heroic race Revenant trait Past Life (half-elf) power dark reaping racial Power Repertoire Racial You gain the Dilettante half-elf racial trait. In a given encounter, you can use either the power from your Dilettante trait or your dark reaping racial power. Half-Elf Spirit Speaker Heroic race Half-elf class any primal Bloodied Class Defense Skill Enhancement Support Triggered The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you and each ally within 10 squares of you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until start of the acting creature's next turn. Also, allies within 10 squares of you have a +1 racial bonus to Insight checks and Nature checks. Half-Orc Vengeance Heroic race Half-orc class Warden Attack Bonus Bloodied Class Damage Bonus Mark Punishment Triggered The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against creatures you have marked until the end of your next turn. The bonus to damage rolls increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level. Halfling Agility Heroic race Halfling power second chance racial Attack Penalty Power Enhancement Racial When you use your second chance racial power, the attacker takes a -2 penalty to the second attack roll. Halfling Fast Talk Heroic race Halfling power second chance racial Racial Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Bluff checks. Halfling Shortbow Hunter Heroic race Halfling proficiency shortbow Damage Bonus Racial Weapon Specialization When you use a shortbow you have proficiency with, it gains the Brutal 2 weapon trait and its range increases to 20/40. Halfling Stalwart Heroic race Halfling role Defender Attack Bonus Class Mark Punishment Racial Size-based You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against Large or larger creatures marked by you. Hammer of Moradin Heroic class Artificer deity Moradin Class Implement Specialization Proficiency Gain Weapon Specialization Worship You gain proficiency with the warhammer. Hammering Iron Heroic Forced Movement Opportunity Attacks Weapon Specialization Whenever you hit a target with an opportunity attack using a hammer or mace you have proficiency with, you can also push the target 1 square. If your opportunity attack already pushes the target, increase the maximum distance by 1 square instead. If you have abilities or items that allow you to increase this distance, calculate the full distance and then halve it (rounded down) for this. Hammering Strike Heroic power power strike attack Condition Infliction Power Enhancement Weapon Enhancement When you use your power strike attack power with a Hammer or Mace you have proficiency with, you can choose to reduce the damage by +1[W]. Hand of Radiant Fury Heroic class Invoker power hand of radiance attack Class Miss Mitigation Power Enhancement When you miss all targets with an invoker daily attack, you can use your hand of radiance at-will attack once as a minor action before the end of your current turn. Harbinger of Nature's Wrath Heroic Multiclass ability Wisdom 13 Multiclass Druid Power Repertoire Proficiency Gain Skill Training You gain training in the Nature skill. Harbinger of Recovery Heroic class Cleric skill Heal Class Dying Skill Enhancement Support You gain a +2 bonus to Heal checks made to aid others. Harlequin Style Heroic ability Charisma 15 class any martial Class Mobility Power Enhancement You gain the following benefits with martial at-will attacks: ► If the attack allows you to move, you gain a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by that movement. Harrying Step Heroic class Battlemind power blurred step class power persistent harrier class Class Power Enhancement Teleportation When you use your blurred step class power, you can teleport to any square adjacent to the triggering enemy instead of shifting. Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Stealth checks. In addition, you gain darkvision out to 5 squares. If your origin was already show or you learn any of the multiclass powers, the range limit is removed. You can learn any of the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level. Choose Dexterity or Charisma when you take this feat. You use the chosen ability for attack and damage rolls with these powers. Heat Adaptation Heroic Background Damage Resistance You gain resist fire equal to one-half your level (minimum 1). Heavenly Halberdier Heroic class Runepriest Class Forced Movement Proficiency Gain Weapon Specialization You gain proficiency with the glaive and the halberd. Heavenly Heritage Heroic ability Wisdom 13 ; race Deva or feat Astral Heritage Temporary Hit Points Triggered When you take cold damage or fire damage, you gain temporary hit points after that damage has been resolved. Heavy Armor Agility Heroic ability Strength 15 or ability Constitution 15 Armor Mobility You ignore the speed penalty for wearing heavy armor. If your power strike deals at least +4[W] additional damage, your melee basic attack deals +1[W] additional damage. Hellfire Blood Heroic race Tiefling Attack Bonus Fear Fire Specialization Racial You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls with Fear and Fire powers.
