Hunting Wolf Style Heroic ability Wisdom 13 class any martial Class Charge Mobility When you use a martial melee at-will attack that allows you to move or shift before making the attack, you can choose to charge instead, making that power's attack instead of a melee basic attack. If you are a warlord and use your tactician's command while in a poise that allows the target ally to move or shift before making the attack, you can choose to allow him or her to make a charge attack instead. Hurl Breath Heroic race Dragonborn power dragon breath racial Power Enhancement Racial When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to make it an area 1 within 10 squares instead of close blast 3. Hurl Weapon Heroic class Barbarian Class Weapon Specialization You can use any one-handed weapon with the Off-hand trait as a Heavy Thrown weapon with a range of 5/10. If the weapon is Light Thrown, you can use its normal range if it is better. Starting at 11th level, you can use any one-handed weapon as a Heavy Thrown weapon with a range of 3/6. When you use a weapon that normally has the Heavy Thrown trait, you increase the normal range by 2 squares and the long range by 4 squares. This counts as having the Far Throw feat. This benefit also applies to Off-hand weapons you use as Heavy Thrown weapons starting at 11th level, and to any Heavy Thrown weapon starting at 21st level. Ice Walk Heroic Bloodline race Eladrin feat Winterkin Heritage Mobility Racial Winterkin Heritage You ignore difficult terrain created by ice or snow. Icy Clutch of Stygia Heroic race Tiefling Cold Specialization Damage Bonus Ongoing Damage Racial Triggered Whenever an enemy successfully saves against ongoing damage that you imposed, that enemy takes cold damage equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier. This cold damage increases to 5 + your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 10 + your Intelligence modifier or your Charisma modifier at 21st level. Imaginative Reaction Heroic class Warlord feature Combat Leader feature Resourceful Presence Class Initiative Support Whenever you roll initiative, you can choose to subtract 4 from your check result. If you do, choose one or two allies who benefit from your Combat Leader class feature. One ally gains a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier to his or her initiative check, and the other gains a bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier to his or her initiative check. Immolate the Masses Heroic class Sorcerer or class Wizard Class Temporary Hit Points Triggered When you reduce at least one minion to 0 hit points or fewer with a Sorcerer power or a Wizard power, you gain temporary hit points equal to the number minions you hit with that power. These temporary hit points increase to twice the number of minions at 11th level, and to three times the number of minions at 21st level. Immortal Skill Heroic race Deva power memories of a thousand lifetimes racial Power Enhancement Racial Skill Enhancement When using your memories of a thousand lifetimes racial power to modify a skill check or ability check, you treat a result that is lower than the average for the die you roll (3 for d6, or 4 for d8) as the average. Also, when you hit a creature that has not yet acted in an encounter with an attack, it takes a penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Charisma modifier. In addition, you can master and perform rituals in the divination category as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. You can also master and perform the banish illusions, eavesdropper's foil, and scry trap rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Finding Heroic Dragonmark Mobility Perception Rituals When an enemy granting combat advantage to you is adjacent and shifts, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. Also, you can master and perform the detect object, detect secret doors, find the path, and inquisitive's eyes rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Handling Heroic Dragonmark Animal Companion Defense Mobility Mounted Combat Rituals You gain the benefits of the Mounted Combat feat. While you are mounted on a natural beast, the mount gains a +2 feat bonus to speed and a +1 feat bonus to AC. Also, if you have an animal companion, that companion gains a +2 feat bonus to speed and a +1 feat bonus to AC. In addition, you can master and perform the animal messenger and steed summons rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Healing Heroic Dragonmark Healing Rituals Saving Throws Whenever you use a Healing power on an ally, or use the Heal skill to allow an ally to use his or her second wind, that ally can also make a saving throw against a single effect that ends on a save. Also, you can master and perform rituals in the restoration category as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. You can also master and perform the remove affliction ritual as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Hospitality Heroic Dragonmark Healing Rituals During a short rest, if you or an ally spends at least one healing surge to regain hit points, that character regains additional hit points during the short rest. The additional hit points equal 1 + one-half the level of any unexpended encounter Healing powers available to characters taking the rest. For Healing powers without a level, such as healing word or ardent surge, use one-half the level of the character. Also, you can master and perform the eye of alarm, fantastic recuperation, secure shelter, and travelers' feast rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Making Heroic Dragonmark Equipment Rituals You have mastered the enchant magic item ritual and can perform it as if you were two levels higher. Also, you have the Alchemist feat and can create alchemical items as if you were two levels higher. In addition, you can master and perform rituals in the creation category as well as the make whole ritual as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Passage Heroic Dragonmark Mobility Rituals Teleportation Whenever one of your powers lets you move, shift, or teleport, you can increase the distance by 1 square. Also, you can master and perform rituals in the travel category as well as the enhance vessel, find the path, passwall, phantom steed, steed summon, and water walk rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Scribing Heroic Dragonmark Languages Rituals Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks. Also, choose four languages. You can speak, read, and write the chosen languages. When you gain a level, you can retrain one of these languages in addition to the normal retrain you get. In addition, you have the Ritual Caster feat, and can create ritual scrolls in half the normal time. Mark of Sentinel Heroic Dragonmark Mobility Opportunity Attacks Rituals Whenever an enemy provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can shift 1 square either before or after making the attack. Also, you can master and perform the eye of alarm, eye of warning, and magic circle rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Shadow Heroic Dragonmark Miss Mitigation Rituals Stealth Whenever you make an attack and miss every target while hidden, you remain hidden. Also, whenever you make an attack and miss every target while invisible, you remain invisible, even if the effect normally ends when you attack. In addition, you can master and perform rituals in the deception and scrying categories, as well as the knock, masking shroud, secret page, and shadow walk rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of Storm Heroic Dragonmark Forced Movement Lightning Specialization Mobility Rituals Thunder Specialization Whenever you hit a creature with a Thunder or Lightning power, you can slide that creature 1 square. Mark of Warding Heroic Dragonmark Defense Mark Punishment Rituals Whenever one of your powers grants a bonus to a defense, increase that bonus by 1. Also, whenever you mark an enemy, that enemy takes a -3 penalty to attack rolls instead of the normal -2 penalty. In addition, you can master and perform rituals in the warding category, as well as the fluid funds, knock, and Leomund's secret chest rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat. Mark of the Infernal Heroic race Tiefling power infernal wrath racial class Paladin feature Divine Sanction Class Marking Power Enhancement Racial The target of your infernal wrath racial power is also subject to your Divine Sanction until the start of its next turn. Marked Fortunes Heroic race Githzerai trait Shifting Fortunes role Defender Class Marking Racial Second Wind When you use your Shifting Fortunes racial trait to shift as part of using your second wind, you can mark each enemy adjacent to you at the end of that shift. Marked Fury Heroic class Fighter Attack Penalty Class Mark Punishment If an enemy marked by you is adjacent to you when it makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, the penalty to attack rolls is either -2 or the number of enemies adjacent to you, whichever is higher. Marked with Iron Heroic ability Wisdom 13 race Githzerai power iron mind racial role Defender Attack Penalty Class Mark Punishment Power Enhancement Racial When you use your iron mind racial power, each target marked by you takes an additional penalty to attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of its next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Wisdom modifier. Marked for Death Heroic ability Constitution 13 race Revenant power dark reaping racial Damage Bonus Mark Punishment Necrotic Specialization Power Enhancement Racial When you deal the damage from your dark reaping racial power to a target, other enemies marked by you take necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier. This necrotic damage increases to 2 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level. Markings of the Blessed Heroic race Goliath Background Racial Saving Throws In each encounter, the first time you make a saving throw, you can roll twice and use either result. Markings of the Elements Heroic race Goliath power stone's endurance racial class any primal Background Class Damage Resistance Power Enhancement Racial When you use your stone's endurance racial power, you can choose cold, fire, lightning, poison, radiant, or thunder. If you do, you gain resist to the chosen damage type instead of resist all, but the resistance increases by 5. Markings of the Predator Heroic race Goliath class any primal Background Bloodied Enemy Class Defense Racial Triggered When you bloody a creature, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. Markings of the Victor Heroic race Goliath Attack Bonus Background Racial In each encounter, the first time you make an attack roll, you can roll twice and use either result. Martial Adaptation Heroic class any martial Class Power Repertoire When you take this feat, choose one martial daily attack power of your level or lower from your class. After an extended rest, you can swap the chosen power for a martial daily attack power you know of the same level. You can substitute the original power back in after another extended rest. Martial Alacrity Heroic ability Dexterity 15 ; class any martial or class Monk Class Initiative Mobility You gain a +2 feat bonus to initiative checks. Also, during your first turn you can step as a minor action. Martial Dilettante Heroic race Half-elf trait Dilettante class any martial Class Power Recovery Racial If the power you gained from your Dilettante racial trait is a martial power, the first time in an encounter that you use your Dilettante power, you regain its use at the start of your next turn. Martial Flexibility Heroic class any martial Class Power Repertoire When you take this feat, choose one martial utility power of your level or lower from your class. After an extended rest, you can swap the chosen power for a martial utility power you know of the same level. You can substitute the original power back in after another extended rest. Martial Freedom Heroic ability Wisdom 13 class any martial skill Endurance Class Condition Negation Saving Throws You gain a +5 bonus to saving throws against the slowed and immobilized conditions. Martial Ploy Heroic class any martial Attack Bonus Class Support When you use the aid attack action, the chosen ally can roll twice and use either result on his or her next Weapon attack instead of the +2 bonus the action normally grants. Martial Readiness Heroic class any martial Class Power Repertoire When you take this feat, choose one 1st-level martial at-will attack power from your class. After an extended rest, you can swap the chosen power for a 1st-level martial at-will attack power you know. You can substitute the original power back in after another extended rest. Martial Vampire Heroic class Vampire and class any martial Bloodied Class Combination Healing Surge Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with a martial attack power, you gain a healing surge. Also, the first time you are bloodied in an encounter, you gain a healing surge. If you do not spend this healing surge before the end of the encounter, you lose it. Martial Versatility Heroic class any martial Class Power Repertoire When you take this feat, choose one martial encounter attack power of your level or lower from your class. After an extended rest, you can swap the chosen power for a martial encounter attack power you know of the same level. You can substitute the original power back in after another extended rest. Martyr's Surge Heroic class Ardent power ardent surge class Bloodied Class Healing Power Enhancement If you are bloodied when you use your ardent surge class power, the target regains an additional +1d6 hit points. These additional hit points regained increase to +2d6 at 21st level. Master Communicator Heroic race Half-elf Languages Racial Rituals You master and can perform the comprehend languages ritual, and can use Diplomacy in place of Arcana to perform the ritual. Also, you can perform the ritual once per day without paying its component cost. Master Crafter Heroic class Artificer feature Ritual Casting Class Equipment Rituals When you use the enchant magic item ritual to create a magic item, you can create a magic item of your level + one-half your Intelligence modifier or lower. Master Mixer Heroic class Artificer feature Alchemical Crafting Class Equipment You can create potions as if they were alchemical items. Master at Arms Heroic Weapon Specialization You can use a minor action to sheathe a weapon, and then draw a weapon. Master of Rumbling Earth Heroic race Genasi power earthshock racial ; class Fighter or class Warden Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with your earthshock racial power. Also, when you knock an enemy prone with your earthshock racial power, you deal damage to it equal to your Strength modifier. This damage increases to 3 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Strength modifier at 21st level. Maw of the Hungry Killer Heroic race Gnoll class Assassin feature Assassin's Shroud Class Kill Effect Racial Teleportation When you reduce a creature that has at least one of your shrouds on it to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + the number of your shrouds on the target. If you invoked your shrouds on the attack that reduced the creature to 0 hit points and have the shadow step class power, you can use that power as a free reaction, even if you are not adjacent to a creature. The temporary hit points increase to 5 + twice the number of your shrouds on it at 11th level, and to 6 + twice the number of your shrouds on it at 21st level. Melee Training Heroic Attack Bonus Basic Attack Damage Bonus Choose an ability score other than Strength. When you make a melee basic attack using a weapon with which you have proficiency, you can use the chosen ability instead of Strength for the attack roll. Also, you can use half the chosen ability's modifier, instead of your Strength modifier, for the damage roll. Memories of Destruction Heroic Spellscar race Deva power memory of a thousand lifetimes racial Condition Negation Power Enhancement Racial Spellscar Whenever you are subjected to a dazing or stunning effect that a save can end, you can expend your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power as an immediate interrupt to make a saving throw against that effect. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, each enemy adjacent to you takes 5 fire damage when you expend your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power this way. Merciless Nature Heroic race Wilden power wrath of the destroyer racial class Assassin feature Assassin's Shroud Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Racial If the enemy triggering your wrath of the destroyer racial power has one or more of your shrouds on it, you gain combat advantage for the attack granted by the power. Mercy's Reward Heroic class Paladin feature Hand of the Cause Class Critical Healing When you score a critical hit, you can choose to reduce it to a normal hit instead. If you do, you or one ally adjacent to you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, plus an additional 5 hit points. The additional hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level. The bonus to damage rolls increases to +3 at 21st level. Midnight Blade Marauder Heroic class Ranger feat Midnight Blade Student Attack Bonus Class Mobility Power Enhancement Weapon Specialization When you are wielding a Light Blade that you have proficiency with, you gain the following benefits when attacking with it: ► When you hit with a martial melee encounter or martial melee daily attack, you can increase the distance of any shift you make by 1 square until the end of your current turn. ► When you hit with a martial melee encounter attack, you gain a +1 bonus to the next attack roll you make before the end of your current turn. Plagued Breath Spellscar Heroic race Dragonborn power dragon breath racial Bloodied Damage Bonus Necrotic Specialization Ongoing Damage Power Enhancement Racial Spellscar Your dragon breath racial power does necrotic damage in addition to the type or types it otherwise deals, and gains the Necrotic keyword. Also, while you're bloodied, your dragon breath deals +2 damage. This additional damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, each target you hit with your dragon breath racial power also takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends). This ongoing damage increases to 7 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level. The regeneration you gain increases by 1 at 11th level, and by 2 at 21st level. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, an ally adjacent to you only takes 1 necrotic damage. Plaguescrorch Accuracy Spellscar Heroic race Elf power elven accuracy racial Fire Specialization Necrotic Specialization Power Enhancement Racial Spellscar Your elven accuracy racial power gains the Fire and Necrotic keywords. Plaguing Bloodhunt Spellscar Heroic race Tiefling trait Bloodhunt Bloodied Enemy Damage Bonus Fire Specialization Necrotic Specialization Racial Spellscar When you hit a bloodied enemy, that enemy also takes 3 necrotic damage. Planar Distortion Spellscar Heroic race Eladrin power fey step racial Forced Movement Power Enhancement Racial Spellscar Teleportation When you use your fey step racial power, either before or after you teleport, you can slide one creature adjacent to you 1 square. This slide increases to a maximum of 2 squares starting at 21st level. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, you can also teleport one creature adjacent to you 2 squares. If you slide a creature before teleporting, you teleport a creature after having teleported, and vice versa. This teleport increases to 3 squares starting at 21st level. Plant's Sap Heroic race Wilden Bloodied Racial Saving Throws You gain a +5 bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage that lacks a damage type. Also, while you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against all other ongoing damage. In addition, you do not need to eat or sleep. Instead of sleeping, you enter a state of inactivity for 4 hours to gain the benefits of an extended rest. While in this state, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal. Pointed Step Style Heroic class Monk feature Flurry of Blows Class Power Enhancement Weapon Specialization When your Flurry of Blows power is triggered by an attack you make with a Spear, one target of that power can be up to 2 squares away from you. Poison Adaptation Heroic Damage Resistance You gain resist poison equal to one-half your level (minimum 1). If you already resist poison, you instead increase that resist by 5. Poison Inured Heroic ability Constitution 13 Saving Throws You gain a feat bonus to saving throws against Poison effects. The bonus equals your Constitution modifier. Poison Plague Feast Spellscar Heroic race Dwarf Racial Saving Throws Spellscar Temporary Hit Points Whenever you successfully save against a Poison, you gain temporary hit points equal to 1 + one-half your level. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, you also gain a +2 bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn in addition to the temporary hit points. Poisoner Multiclass Heroic skill Dungeoneering or skill Nature Damage Bonus Multiclass Poisoner Poison Skill Training You gain training in the Thievery skill. Also, your attacks ignore the first 5 points the target's resist poison. This increases to ingoring the first 10 points at 11th level, and to the first 15 points at 21st level. In addition, you treat a creature that is immune to poison as having resist poison equal to 15 + one-half its level. Polearm Expertise Heroic Defense Weapon Specialization While you are wielding a two-handed Polearm that you have proficiency with in two hands, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against charge attacks, and other attacks where the attacker moves to you from further away as part of the attack. Polearm Flanker Heroic Flanking Weapon Specialization When you make a melee Weapon attack with a Polearm that you have proficiency with against a target that is not adjacent to you, choose an unoccupied square that is adjacent to both you and the target. You are considered to occupy that square for the purpose of determining if you flank the target when resolving the attack. Polearm Momentum Heroic ability Dexterity 15 ability Wisdom 15 class Fighter Class Condition Infliction Forced Movement Weapon Specialization Whenever you make a Weapon attack with a Polearm or Spear you have proficiency with and push or slide the target more than 2 squares, you can choose to halve forced movement to knock the target prone at the end of the forced movement. Potent Enforcement Heroic ability Wisdom 15 class Fighter power enforce challenge class Class Damage Bonus Mark Punishment You gain a +1 bonus to the damage roll for the attack you make as part of your enforce challenge Fighter attack. This bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. You gain an additional +1 bonus to the damage roll if you are wielding a two-handed weapon. This additional bonus increases to +2 at 21st level. Potent Rebirth Heroic race Deva Attack Bonus Damage Bonus Dying Racial When you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter. Potent Restorables Heroic class Artificer Class Healing Your Artificer Healing powers restore 2 extra hit points. The extra hit points increase to 3 at 6th level, to 4 at 11th level, to 5 at 16th level, to 6 at 21st level, and to 7 at 26th level. Power Attack Heroic ability Strength 15 Damage Bonus When making a melee Weapon attack, you can take a -2 penalty to the attack roll. If you do, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll per [W] of damage, or a +4 bonus if you make the attack with a weapon wielded in two hands. Your DM can allow you to use this with non-Weapon attacks as well, such as those flavored as done with your body or a shield. Power Cascade Heroic class Psion Class Damage Bonus Force Specialization Psychic Specialization When you hit an enemy with a psion daily attack power, you gain a cascade benefit with unaugmented psion at-will attack powers against that enemy until the end of your next turn. The cascade benefit is an additional 1d6 extra force or psychic damage, your choice. The power also gains the corresponding keyword. You can only gain this benefit once per creature. The additional damage increases to 2d6 if you use a daily attack power of 15th or higher, and to 3d6 if you use a daily attack power of 25th level or higher. Power Throw Heroic ability Strength 15 Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization When making a ranged Weapon attack with a Heavy Thrown weapon, you can choose to take a -2 penalty to the attack roll. If you do, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll per [W] of damage. Your DM can allow you to use this with non-Weapon attacks as well, if the flavour of the attack fits. Powerful Charge Heroic ability Strength 15 Attack Bonus Charge Damage Bonus Forced Movement When you charge, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls as part of that charge, and a +2 bonus to attack rolls when making a bull rush as part of that charge. The bonus to damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. Precise Fangs Heroic class Shaman feature Stalker Spirit Attack Bonus Class Power Enhancement You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with your spirit's fangs class power. Precise Hunter Heroic ability Wisdom 15 class Ranger feature Hunter's Quarry Attack Bonus Class Critical Support When you score a critical hit against your quarry with a ranged attack, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that target until the start of your next turn. Precise Mind Heroic class Psion feature Psionic Augmentation Attack Bonus Class Psionics Whenever you hit with a psionic attack power that has been augmented with 2 or more power points, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with unaugmented psionic at-will attack powers. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn. Precision Throw Heroic class any martial or class Monk Attack Bonus Basic Attack Class Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization Whenever you make a ranged basic attack using a thrown weapon that you have proficiency with, you can always use Dexterity for the attack roll and damage roll, even if the weapon has the Heavy Thrown property. Predator's Burst Heroic class Druid feature Primal Predator power whild shape class Charge Class Damage Bonus Mobility Shapechange When you charge while you are in beast form, you gain a +2 feat bonus to speed and a +1 bonus to damage rolls as part of that charge. The bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. Predatory Action Heroic class Ranger feature Hunger's Quarry Action Point Class Damage Bonus When you spend an action point to take an extra action and deal your Hunter's Quarry damage as part of that action, it does not count towards your normal limit of dealing Hunter's Quarry damage only once per turn. Predatory Magic Heroic race Shifter class any arcane power razorclaw shifting racial Class Mobility Racial When you use a close arcane attack power while you are under the effect of your razorclaw shifting racial power, you can shift 1 square either before or after resolving that power. Starting at 21st level, you can shift 1 square both before and after resolving the power. Prepared for Anything Heroic class Warlord feature Combat Leader Class Defense Initiative Support Any ally who benefits from your Combat Leader class feature also gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of his or her first turn in an encounter (after any surprise round, if applicable). Prescient Fortification Heroic class Bard feature Virtue of Prescience Class Support When you use your Virtue of Prescience to grant a power bonus to an ally, increase that bonus by 2. Preserver's Call Heroic race Kalashtar class Invoker feature Covenant of Preservation Class Mobility Racial Support Triggered When you use a divine daily attack power on your turn, you can choose to gain the following effect instead of the normal benefit of your Covenant Manifestation: You pull each ally within 5 squares of you 1 square. This inscreases to pull up to 2 squares at 21st level. Preserver's Summons Heroic class Invoker power preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity Channel Divinity Class Mobility Power Enhancement Support When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, you can slide the triggering ally 1 square. If the ally is marked, you can also end that condition. The slide increases to up to 2 squares at 21st level. Preverving Concealment Heroic race Gnome class Invoker feature Covenant of Preservation Channel Divinity Class Concealment Power Enhancement Racial When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, you can also grant concealment to the triggering ally. The concealment lasts until the start of the acting creature's next turn. Preserving Shadows Heroic race Shadar-kai class Invoker power preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity Channel Divinity Class Damage Resistance Power Enhancement Racial Support When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, you can also make the triggering ally insubstantial. He or she remains insubstantial until the start of the acting creature's next turn. Press the Advantage Heroic ability Intelligence 15 class Rogue Class Combat Advantage Critical If you score a critical hit while you have combat advantage against the target, you gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn. Primal Dragon Power Heroic race Dragonborn class Warden ; power dragon breath racial or power dragonfear racial Class Marking Power Enhancement Racial When you use your dragon breath racial power or your dragonfear racial power, you can choose to mark each target. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn. Primal Fey Step Heroic race Eladrin class any primal power fey step racial Bloodied Class Racial Teleportation Triggered The first time you are bloodied in an encounter, you can use your fey step racial power as an immediate reaction without expending it or even if you have already expended it. Primal Halfling Counterattack Heroic race Halfling power second chance class any primal Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial When you use your second chance racial power, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn. The bonus to damage increases to +5 at 11th level, and to +8 at 21st level. Primal Instinct Heroic class Druid feature Primal Guardian Class Initiative Support When you roll initiative at the start of any encounter, one ally within 5 squares of you can reroll his or her initiative. Primal Resilience Heroic race Half-orc trait Half-orc Resilience class any primal Bloodied Class Racial Temporary Hit Points Triggered You gain additional temporary hit points from your Half-orc Resilience racial trait equal to your Constitution modifier. Primal Sharpshooter Heroic Multiclass ability Wisdom 13 Miss Mitigation Multiclass Seeker Power Repertoire Skill Training You gain training in the Nature skill. Also, you gain the Seeker class power inevitable shot as a daily power. Unlike the normal class power, you do not regain the use of this when you spend an action point. In addition, choose one 1st-level Seeker at-will attack power. You gain that power as an encounter power. Primal Vampire Heroic class Vampire and class any primal Class Combination Healing Surge Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with a primal encounter attack power, you gain a healing surge. Also, your number of healing surges increases by two. Prime Beast Strike Heroic class Ranger feature Beast Mastery Animal Companion Attack Bonus Class Your beast companion gains the Prime Strike class feature, except you do not count as a creature for the purposes of determining if your companion gains the bonus to attack rolls. You can choose feats that require the Prime Strike class feature, but the benefits apply to your beast companion instead of you. Prime Burst Heroic class Ranger or class Warlock ; feature Prime Shot Attack Bonus Class You gain the benefit of your Prime Shot class feature with area burst attacks in addition to ranged attacks. Primordial Surge Heroic race Genasi trait Elemental Manifestation Power Enhancement Racial Temporary Hit Points Whenever you use the racial power from your Elemental Manifestation racial trait, you gain temporary hit points equal to 2 + your Strength modifier, your Constitution modifier, or your Dexterity modifier. These temporary hit points increase to 5 + your ability modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your ability modifier at 21st level. Prolonging Curse Heroic class Warlock feature Warlock's Curse Class Ongoing Damage Saving Throw Penalty When you hit a target under your curse with a warlock attack that deals ongoing damage, the target takes a penalty to saving throws against that ongoing damage equal to the number of extra dice of damage you deal with your Warlock's Curse. Protected Mind Heroic ability Charisma 13 Condition Negation Defense Mobility Saving Throws Triggered You gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws against effects that daze, stun, or dominate you, as well as ongoing psychic damage. Also, when you succeed on a saving throw to end one of these effects, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction and gain a +2 bonus to Will until the start of your next turn. Protector Spirit Adept Heroic class Shaman feature Protector Spirit Class Defense Support Your allies gain a +1 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will while adjacent to your spirit companion. Protector's Atonement Heroic class any divine deity a deity with the Protection domain Class Support Worship Whenever an attack you make would damage an ally, you can choose to take the damage instead. You have resist 5 all against damage taken this way, though your other resists or immunities do not apply. You can choose to take the damage even when you are dominated. The resist against this damage increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level. Protector's Commitment Heroic ability Strength 13 ability ability 13 class Paladin Attack Bonus Bloodied Class You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls when either you or the target of that attack is adjacent to a bloodied ally. Protector's Shield Heroic class Shaman feature Protector Spirit Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Your spirit's shield class power deals 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage instead of what the power normally lists. The power's damage increases to 2d8 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level. Psiforged Resolve Heroic race Warforged power warforged resolve racial class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Bloodied Class Power Enhancement Psionics Racial When you are bloodied and use your warforged resolve racial power, you can choose to regain 1 power point instead of regaining hit points. The number of power points you regain increases to 2 at 21st level. Psion Hashalaq Initiation Heroic race Kalashtar class Psion power distract class Class Forced Movement Power Enhancement Racial When you use your distract class power, you can also slide the target 2 squares to a space adjacent to an ally. Psionic Accuracy Heroic race Elf power elven accuracy racial class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Your elven accuracy racial power gains the Augmentable keyword with the following augment: Augment 1: You gain combat advantage against the target of the triggering attack roll until the end of your next turn. Psionic Celerity Heroic class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Charge Class Mobility Psionics Whenever you run or charge, you gain a +2 bonus to speed. This does not stack with the Fast Runner feat. As part of any movement, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 bonus to speed until the end of your current turn. Psionic Ferocity Heroic race Minotaur trait Ferocity class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Bonus Psionics Racial Triggered When you make an attack as part of your Ferocity racial trait, you can spend 1 power point to deal +1[W] extra damage, or +1d8 extra damage if your attack is not a Weapon attack. Psionic Fortune Heroic class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Psionics Saving Throws While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws. Also, when you make a saving throw on your turn, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws until the end of your current turn. Psionic Fury Heroic race Half-orc power furious assault racial class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Your furious assault gains the Augmentable keyword, and the following augment: Augment 1: Effect: You deal damage to each enemy adjacent to you equal to your Strength modifier or your Dexterity modifier. If the triggering attack was made with a Weapon or Implement, you add its enhancement bonus to the damage. If the triggering attack deals a type of damage, your furious assault gains the corresponding keyword and this damage is of the same time. Psionic Initiative Heroic class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Initiative Psionics You gain a +3 feat bonus to Initiative checks. Also, when you roll initiative, you can spend 1 power point to increase this to a +6 feat bonus. Psionic Reflexes Heroic class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Attack Bonus Class Opportunity Attacks Psionics You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks. Also, when you make an opportunity attack, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll. Psionic Scorn Heroic class Warlock feature Sorcer-King Pact class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Combination Power Recovery Psionics When you use your fell might recovery class power, you can choose to regain 1 power point instead of regaining your fell might. Psionic Skill Heroic class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Psionics Skill Enhancement Choose any skill. You gain a +2 feat bonus to checks with that skill. Also, when you make a check with the chosen skill, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +3 power bonus to that check. You can take this feat more than one. Each time you take this feat, you must choose a different skill. Psionic Toughness Heroic class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Hit Points Psionics Second Wind You gain 3 additional hit points. These additional hit points increase to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level. Also, your when you use your second wind you regain an additional 5 hit points. These additional hit points regained increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level. Psionic Trick Heroic race Changeling class any psionic power changeling trick racial Class Combat Advantage Defense Movement Power Racial Your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from enemies granting combat advantage to you. Also, you do not provoke opportunity attacks at all from a target under the effects of your changeling trick racial power. Psionic Vampire Heroic class Vampire and class any divine Class Combination Healing Surge Psionics Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with an augmented psionic attack, you gain a healing surge. Once per encounter, you can use a minor action to spend a healing surge to gain 2 power points. These power points expire at the end of your current turn. Psychic Corruption of Malbolge Heroic race Tiefling class any psionic feature Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Bonus Fire Specialization Racial Psychic Specialization After you hit an enemy with an augmented psionic power, that enemy gains vulnerable 2 fire and vulnerable 2 psychic against your powers until the end of your next turn. Both of these vulnerables increase to 4 at 11th level, and to 6 at 21st level. Psychic Feast Heroic race Shifter class any psionic power longtooth shifting racial Class Healing Power Enhancement Racial Once per turn while you are under the effects of your longtooth shifting racial power and hit with a psionic attack on your, you immediately regain a number of hit points equal to one-half your regeneration value. Psychic Focus Heroic race Shardmind trait Crystalline Mind Damage Bonus Psychic Specialization Racial You gain a +2 feat bonus to damage with Psychic powers. This applies to damage rolls, and to any damage where you apply either your weapon or implement's enhancement bonus. This damage bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. Psychic Retaliation Heroic race Kalashtar class Avenger feature Oath of Enmity power bastion of mental clarity racial Class Power Enhancement Racial When you use your bastion of mental clarity racial power, you can change the triggering enemy to be your oath target. Pulse of Lightning Heroic race Wilden trait Nature's Aspect Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial Triggered When you use your Nature's Aspect racial power, the first time an enemy attacks you with a close attack or area attack before the end of your next turn, that enemy takes lightning damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. This lightning damage increases to 6 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 10 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level. If you are in the Aspect of the Elements, you can choose a second enemy you can see. The chosen enemy takes half as much lightning damage as the triggering enemy. Punishing Spike Heroic class Battlemind power mind spike class Class Mark Punishment Power Enhancement Saving Throw Penalty When you damage a target with your mind spike class power, the target takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes. If the target does not attempt any saving throws by the end of its next turn, this effect ends. Pupil of the All-Father Heroic class any divine deity Moradin Class Equipment Rituals Worship You have mastered the enchant magic item and make whole rituals, and can perform them without a ritual book. Also, when using the enchant magic item ritual to enchant weapons or armor, you count as being three levels higher than you are. In addition, once per day, you can perform the make whole ritual without expending components as long as the component cost would have been 100 gp or fewer. Purifying Light Heroic ability Charisma 15 class any divine Attack Bonus Class Radiant Specialization Undead-hunting You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against undead with Radiant powers. Pursuing Step Heroic class Battlemind power blurred step class Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement When you use your blurred step class power and end the shift adjacent to the triggering enemy, that enemy grants you combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn. Quick Draw Heroic ability Dexterity 13 Equip Initiative You gain a +2 feat bonus to Initiative checks. You can draw a weapon (or an object, such as a potion, stored in a belt pouch, a bandolier, or a similar container) as part of the same action used to attack with the weapon (or use the object). Quick Familiar Heroic Familiar feat Arcane Familiar Familiar Mobility Once per turn, you can move your familiar as a minor action instead of a move action. Quick Reaction Heroic class Battlemind power speed of thought class Class Initiative Mobility Power Enhancement You can use your Charisma modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier to determine your Initiative bonus. Also, when you use your speed of thought class power, you gain a +2 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn (after any surprise round, if applicable). Quick Stow Heroic class Druid power wild shape class Class Equipment Shapechange When you use your wild shape class power to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you don't automatically drop handheld items that aren't implements. Such items become part of your beast form. However, you gain no benefit from a handheld item, such as a shield, that must be wielded to be functional, and you can use only the properties and powers of the item that don't require you to make an attack with it. Quick and Dead Heroic race Revenant class Assassin power dark reaping racial power shadow step class Class Power Enhancement Racial Teleportation When you use your dark reaping racial power, the distance you can teleport with your shadow step class power increases by 1 square until the end of the encounter. Quori Shield Heroic race Kalashtar trait Dual Soul Damage Resistance Racial You gain resist psychic equal to 5 + one-half your level. Radiant Breath Heroic race Dragonborn class any divine power dragon breath racial Class Power Enhancement Racial Radiant Specialization When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to deal radiant damage rather than the normal damage dealt by the power, and replace the damage type keyword with the Radiant keyword. Radiant Fortification Heroic ability Constitution 13 ; race Deva or feat Astral Heritage Radiant Specialization Temporary Hit Points When you hit with a Radiant power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level. Radiant Rage Heroic class Barbarian class any divine Class Combination Damage Bonus Healing Surge Radiant Specialization When you spend a healing surge while you are raging, you can choose to deal additional radiant damage with first melee attack before the end of your next turn. Radiant Touch Heroic class Paladin power lay on hands class Class Power Repertoire Radiant Specialization Undead-hunting You gain the radiant touch power. This counts as a Paladin power. Rash Sneak Attack Heroic race Human class Rogue feature Sneak Attack Class Damage Bonus Racial When you deal Sneak Attack damage, you can choose to gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of dice of damage your Sneak Attack deals. Rattling Wrath Heroic ability Charisma 15 race Tiefling power infernal wrath racial class Rogue skill Intimidate Attack Penalty Class Fear Power Enhancement Racial When you use your infernal wrath racial power, any Rattling power you use against the target before the end of your next turn has an increased effect. Raven Queen's Sanction Heroic race Revenant class Assassin feature Assassin's Shroud Class Damage Bonus Miss Mitigation Racial Undead-hunting When you invoke your shrouds on an undead or shadow creature and the attack misses, you do not subtract one shroud before determining the damage. Ravenous Blessing Spellscar Heroic Healing Saving Throws Spellscar Support Whenever you target an ally with a Healing power, you can choose to take necrotic damage equal to 3 + one-half your level. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, an ally who regains hit points from this feat also gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn. Razorclaw Mark Heroic race Shifter power razorclaw shifting racial class Fighter Attack Penalty Class Mark Punishment Racial While you are under the effects of your razorclaw shifting racial power, any creature marked by you takes a -3 penalty to attack rolls from the mark instead of -2. Razorclaw Spirit Shifter Heroic race Shifter power razorclaw shifting racial class any primal Class Mobility Racial Triggered While you are under the effects of your razorclaw shifting racial power, when an enemy damage you with an attack against AC or Reflex, you can shift 2 squares as an immediate reaction. Razorclaw Swiftness Heroic race Shifter power razorclaw shifting racial class Warden feature Nature's Wrath Class Marking Mobility Racial While you are under the effects of your razorclaw shifting racial power, you can shift 1 square as part of the free action to mark from your Nature's Wrath class feature. Ready for Battle Heroic ability Strength 13 or ability Dexterity 13 Attack Bonus Damage Bonus During your first turn in every encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to the first Weapon attack roll you make and the first creature that you hit with a Weapon attack takes 2 extra damage from the attack. The extra damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. Reaper's Blade Heroic deity Nerull Damage Bonus Proficiency Gain Weapon Specialization Worship You gain proficiency with the sickle and the scythe. Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with these two weapons. This bonus to damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level. In addition, you treat the sickle as having the High Crit weapon property, and the scythe as dealing 2d6 damage. Reaper's Quarry Heroic ability Constitution 13 race Revenant power dark reaping racial class Ranger feature Hunter's Quarry Class Damage Bonus Necrotic Specialization Racial When you deal necrotic damage using your dark reaping racial power to a target that is also your quarry, your attacks deal additional necrotic damage to that target until the end of your next turn. The additional necrotic damage equals your Constitution modifier, or half that if the attack is a multiattack. The additional damage increases to 2 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level. You still halve this damage if the attack is a multiattack. Reaper's Resistance Heroic race Revenant feat Death's Blessing Damage Resistance Racial Saving Throws You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against Necrotic effects, and resist 5 necrotic. The resistance increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level. Reaper's Touch Heroic race Shadar-kai Basic Attack Power Enhancement Racial You gain the following benefits with any ranged Implement attack that you can use as a ranged basic attack: The power gains a range of Melee touch in addition to its normal range, and you can use it as a melee basic attack. Reaping Blade Heroic ability Dexterity 15 class Fighter Class Kill Effect Mobility Weapon Specialization After you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer with an attack using a Heavy Blade you have proficiency with, you can step as a minor action until the end of your next turn. Reaping Infusion Heroic race Revenant power dark reaping racial class Artificer feature Magical Infusion Class Damage Bonus Necrotic Specialization Power Enhancement Racial Support When you use your dark reaping racial power, choose one ally currently under the effects of your resistive formula or shielding elixir class power. The first attack that ally makes before the end of his or her next turn deals an extra +1d6 necrotic damage. This additional necrotic damage increases to +2d6 if the attack is not a multiattack at 11th level, and to +3d6 at 21st level, or to +1d8 if the attack is a multiattack at 21st level. This necrotic damage increases to 2 + twice the ki focus' enhancement bonus (minimum 3 damage) at 21st level. Reaping Vengeance Heroic race Revenant power dark reaping racial class Avenger feature Oath of Enmity Class Damage Bonus Necrotic Specialization Power Enhancement Racial If the triggering creature for your dark reaping racial power is your oath target, the power deals an additional +1d8 necrotic damage. Slow the Embrace of Death Heroic Dying Saving Throws You gain a +2 feat bonus to death saving throws. This bonus increases by +1 for each failed death saving throw you have made. Spellplague Sense Heroic Spellplague Extensive experience with the Background Skill Enhancement Perception Spellscar You know when you're within 5 squares of something touched by the Spellplague, such as an area affected by it, a plaguetouched creature, or a creature with a spellscar. You can sense the presence of the source, but not the direction or distance. You also gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks. Stealthy Step Heroic race Eladrin power fey step racial skill Stealth Power Enhancement Racial Stealth When you use your fey step racial power, you can make a Stealth check to hide if you have cover or concealment in your destination space. You do not take the -5 penalty for moving more than 2 squares even if you teleported a longer distance. Strengthtening Second Wind Heroic ability Strength 13 Bloodied Damage Bonus Second Wind When you use your second wind, you gain +3 power bonus to the first damage roll you make with a melee Weapon attack before the end of your next turn, or a +5 bonus if you are still bloodied after your second wind. These bonuses to damage increases to +5 and +8 at 11th level, and to +8 and +12 at 21st level. Team Player Heroic ability Wisdom 13 Skill Enhancement Support You gain a +5 bonus to checks to aid another. Also, when you succeed in aid another or use either aid attack or aid defense, you grant the target a +3 bonus instead of +2 bonus. Tormenting Imposition Heroic Combat Advantage Saving Throws When an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect caused by you, you gain combat advantage on your first attack against that enemy before the end of your next turn. Vampiric Alacrity Heroic Bloodline feat Vampiric Heritage Mobility Vampiric Heritage You gain a +1 feat bonus to speed while you are not in direct sunglight. Also, if you hide while you are in dim light or total darkness, you do not take the -5 penalty to your Stealth check for moving more than 2 squares. Vampiric Heritage Heroic Bloodline race living humanoid Grapple Healing Power Repertoire Vampiric Heritage You gain the blood drain bloodline power. When you first take this feat, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability you use for the attack rolls and damage rolls. Also, you gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks and Insight checks to sense and recognize dhampyrs and undead. You can learn the following powers as bloodline powers of the corresponding level. You are considered a vampire for the purpose of effects that relate to vampires, though not a member of the Vampire class. Warborn Fury Heroic ability Constitution 13 or race Warforged ; class any martial Class Damage Bonus Miss Mitigation Power Enhancement You gain the following benefits with martial at-will attacks: ► If the attack deals damage on a miss, you deal +1 additional damage on a miss. This increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level. ► If the attack allows you to shift, you can choose to instead gain a +1 bonus to the damage roll for each square you could've shifted. Warforged Example Heroic race Warforged power warforged resolve racial class Paladin Class Power Enhanement Racial Saving Throws Support When you use your warforged resolve racial power, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that deals ongoing damage. Warforged Faith Heroic race Warforged power warforged resolve racial class any divine Class Power Enhancement Racial Saving Throws Support Temporary Hit Points When you use your warforged resolve racial power, one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 0) and can make a saving throw against one effect that deals ongoing damage. The temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level. Warforged Opportunist Heroic race Warforged class Fighter feature Approach to Opportunities Class Condition Infliction Mobility Opportunity Attacks Racial You gain a benefit depending on the choice you made for your Approach to Opportunities class feature: Combat Agility: You can shift 1 additional square as part of this attack. If a move triggered the attack, you can use your combat agility class power as an opportunity interrupt instead of opportunity reaction. If you do, you follow the triggering creature, shifting into each square it leaves, up to the number of squares you can shift. You make your melee basic attack the target has finished its full move, if it is still within your reach. Combat Superiority: You also knock the target prone on a hit. Zombie Veteran Heroic ability Strength 15 Critical Grapple Skill Enhancement Support Undead-hunting You gain a +2 bonus to Athletics checks to escape being grabbed, and additional creatures grabbing you increase the escape DC by +1 instead of +2. When you make an at-will Weapon attack against an undead creature, you gain the following benefits: ► On a hit, any ally grabbed by the undead can attempt to escape as an opportunity reaction. ► You can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.
